name: Gearboxz
short_description:
Meet Gearboxz, a 2D, Top-Down, semi-realistic arcade driving game, with ambitions to take the world by storm. 

 At least, in a while. We here at Bobstudios are currently working very hard at getting this thing up and running, but seeing we've only got one 16 year old programmer actually working on the game, progress won't be breaking any records any time soon. We're doing the best we can with our available resources. In the meantime, we will regularly be posting beta releases of Gearboxz for your enjoyment.
summary: Meet Gearboxz, a 2D, Top-Down, semi-realistic arcade driving game.
